not working
fdisk?

what's the device?
usb pendrive
MP4 by chance?
no, simply a pendrive, I just need a tool to burn firmware
paste the line in lsusb here , that says about your USB dongle
paste the one line in lsusb here , that says about your USB dongle
10 seconds
is that it?
k, that's it
search for "0a12:0001" and select the linux Bluetooth HOW TO and check if it does help you

i've looked into the HOWTO and they made the example based on exactly the same BT dongle as mine. i take that as "compatible with linux".
and so I think the problem is specific to your dongle, or your computer, everywhere it says it works, isn't it ?
